class.name: KinematicCollision
class.description: Contains collision data for [KinematicBody] collisions. When a [KinematicBody] is moved using [method KinematicBody.move_and_collide], it stops if it detects a collision with another body. If a collision is detected, a KinematicCollision object is returned. This object contains information about the collision, including the colliding object, the remaining motion, and the collision position. This information can be used to calculate a collision response.

method.name: get_angle
method.description: The collision angle according to [code]up_direction[/code], which is [code]Vector3.UP[/code] by default. This value is always positive.
